Do not keep your silver jewelry in closed, stuffy environments for too long.
Keep your jewelry away from chemicals such as acidic compounds, bleach, acetone, etc.
Dishwashing liquid, hand creams, silver remove your jewelry from its natural and shiny appearance.
Hair sprays and cosmetics can damage your silver jewelry.
Remove your accessories before swimming, as
they will cause dulling due to the chemicals contained in the sea and pool waters.

products.title: Cropped Wool-like Coat
products.description: This Cropped Wool-like Coat is a versatile layering piece for your winter fit checks. Dress it up for work with smart high-waist trousers and a fitted shirt, or wear it on the weekend with utility denim and a chunky knit.

products.title: Women's Iconography Printed Quilted Jacket
products.description: This item is sold directly by Bash and may only be returned via courier.  Soft lightweight quilted fabric in 100% Polyester

products.title: Womens TS-ACTV8 Multi-purpose Black Puffer
products.description: Stay cozy and stylish in our TS-ACTV8 Multi-purpose Black Puffer jacket. Made from Nylon Spandex, this versatile jacket is perfect for any sporty look. Ideal for active days, this puffer is a must-have addition to your wardrobe.

products.title: Nike Women's NSW Street Woven Black Jacket
products.description: Contrasting details and an oversized fit turn this jacket into a statement. The woven twill gives you a structured, sturdy feel that still flexes with you for ease of movement. Add in the dropped shoulders, elastic on the waist and a fold-over collar to round off the retro-meets-modern feel. Supplier style is (FN1940-010).

products.title: Womens Nike Sportswear Oversized Fleece Orange Sweatshirt
products.description: Deciding on what to wear has never been easier with this spacious layer. The oversized and exaggerated fit features an extreme drop on the shoulders and voluminous sleeves for an iconic look and cozy comfort. Our midweight brushed fleece feels extra soft on the inside and smooth on the outside, helping you stay cozy while keeping its structured shape.

products.title: G-Star Women's Oversized Pink Denim Jacket
products.description: This G-Star Women's Oversized Pink Denim Jacket is designed in an oversized fit. Offering flap pockets at the chest and slim welt pockets at the waist. A classic shank button closure completes it.

products.title: Men's Union-DNM Sound System White Cotton T-Shirt
products.description: Feel the beat in our Union-DNM Sound System Tee. Made from soft cotton, this white t-shirt features a cool sound system graphic. Easy to care for with cool wash and iron instructions. Perfect for music lovers.

products.title: The North Face Men’s NSE Patch Tee - Black
products.description: Stay comfortable and stylish with The North Face Men’s NSE Patch Tee in classic black. Made from soft single jersey fabric, this tee is perfect for everyday wear. The NSE patch adds a touch of unique detail. E

products.title: adidas Originals Men's Essentials Black Hoodie
products.description: When comfort and practicality are top of your list, the adidas Trefoil Essentials hoodie is the easy choice. This classic hoodie is crafted with a soft cotton blend fleece and finished with an embroidered Trefoil logo. The classic fit ensures comfort for everyday wear. Go for the casual look while still showing a timeless design. We partner with Better Cotton to improve cotton farming globally. Better Cotton makes global cotton production better for the people who produce it, better for the environment it grows in, and better for the sector's future. Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. Supplier style is (IR3774/1).

products.title: Men's Markham Basic Ice Grey Hoodie
products.description: Stay cozy and stylish in this ice grey hoodie. Made with a regular fit and cotton fabrication, it's perfect for cool washes and warm ironing. Designed for comfort, this hoodie is a versatile addition to your wardrobe. Crafted in Madagascar. Easy to care for and super comfy!

products.title: Men's Markham Half Zip Milk Sweatshirt
products.description: Stay cozy in the Markham Half Zip Milk Sweatshirt, made with soft cotton for all-day comfort. This regular fit sweatshirt is easy to care for with cool wash and warm iron instructions. Perfect for any casual occasion, this sweatshirt is a versatile addition to your wardrobe.

products.title: Nike Men's Club Knit Long Sleeve Knit Sail Polo
products.description: From the course to the café, this classic long-sleeve polo from our Nike Club Collection brings a signature staple into your wardrobe. The soft cotton fabric is durable and breathable for easy comfort on the go. Plus, it's designed to feel relaxed around the chest and body for an athletic fit you can layer. Supplier style is (FQ3417-133).

products.title: Nike Men's Max90 Basketball Sail T-Shirt
products.description: This loose-fit heavyweight cotton tee features graphics that show love to players who take their game indoors or outdoors. Who's ready to go ball? Supplier style is (FV8398-133).

products.title: Men's Sage Stripe Top
products.description: Keep it cool by sporting this block stripe tee, pair with your fave bottoms and sneakers for a dope look!

products.title: Redbat Athletics Men's Black Sweat Top
products.description: This Redbat Athletics Men's Black Piped Crew Sweat is made from cosy fleece fabric in a classic sweat style. It has a relaxed fit with a ribbed crew neck and ribbing on the cuffs and hem. White piping detail paired with coordinating graphic prints complete the style. Redbat is available exclusively at sportscene.

products.title: Jet Men's White Good Vibes T-Shirt
products.description: Embrace good vibes with our white graphic tee! Made from soft cotton, this t-shirt is perfect for everyday wear. Positive vibes and comfort guaranteed. Add this to your casual tops collection for a laid-back style.

products.title: Wome's 9ct Silver Crystal Ball Studs Fine Earrings
products.description: Add a touch of elegance to your look with these stunning crystal ball studs. Made with 9ct silver, they feature clear gemstones that sparkle in the light. Perfect for adding a bit of sparkle to any outfit.

customers.name: Sarah M.
customers.testimonial: I'm blown away by the quality and style of the clothes I received from Shop.co. From casual wear to elegant dresses, every piece I've bought has exceeded my expectations.

customers.name: Alex K.
customers.testimonial: Finding clothes that align with my personal style used to be a challenge until I discovered Shop.co. The range of options they offer is truly remarkable, catering to a variety of tastes and occasions.

customers.name: James L.
customers.testimonial: As someone who's always on the lookout for unique fashion pieces, I'm thrilled to have stumbled upon Shop.co. The selection of clothes is not only diverse but also on-point with the latest trends.

customers.name: Michael B.
customers.testimonial: The products are worth every penny. Great quality and service.

customers.name: Jessica W.
customers.testimonial: Absolutely love the products. They exceeded my expectations.
